properties.areaDesc: Western Hampshire; Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden; Eastern Hampden
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 9:36PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
At 934 PM EST...A line of snow showers with embedded snow squalls
was located along a line extending from near Goshen to Huntington to
near Otis, and was moving southeast at 30 mph.

Some of the embedded snow squalls may produce briefly heavy snow,
which could accumulate up to around one half inch in less than an
hour. Any snow cover may cause slippery road conditions especially
if not treated.

Locations impacted include...
Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton,
Agawam, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton,
Longmeadow, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Southwick, Granby, Southampton,
Hadley, Hatfield and Williamsburg.

Drivers need to remain alert. Road conditions can deteriorate
quickly in wintry weather. These conditions often lead to accidents,
especially on highways, since road conditions can change rapidly.
Avoid braking suddenly. Consider delaying travel until the squalls
pass.

NWSheadline: A line of snow showers and a few snow squalls will affect Western Hampshire...Western Hampden... Eastern Hampden...Eastern Hampshire counties through 1015 PM
